summary:
This mod replaces the Dwemer Lift Load Doors with animated versions. 
Now with Animated Dwemer Lift for Nchardak in Dragonborn DLC
descriptionHtml:
[center][Size=7][color=#FF0000][b][u]Animated Dwemer Lift Load Doors[/u][/b][/color][/size][/center]


[center]This mod adds a brief animation to the Dwemer Lift Load Doors found all over Skyrim. Most of the Load doors (Doors which load into a new cell, such as the Gates of Whiterun, Markarth, etc.) do play a short opening animation before game loads the next area, and I felt the Dwemer elevators could use a little something extra to make them seem more real. [/center]


[center]Watch the video and it will explain what I\'m talking about:[/center]

[center][youtube]Zb08boJdBjA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/center]


[center][size=5][color=#FF0000][i]No[/i][/color][/size] ESP file![/center]
[center][size=5][color=#FF0000][i]No[/i][/color][/size] Scripts![/center]

[center]This mod simply replaces two files in your Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\dungeons\\Dwemer\\Facades folder:

dwefacadeliftleverloadup01.nif
dwefacadeliftleverloaddown01.nif

[img]http://www.gifti.me/i/h2GJDKiw.gif[/img]

Thanks to [size=3][color=#FF0000]KillerHell[/color][/size] for making these Animated Gifs

[img]http://oi39.tinypic.com/xbiu4o.jpg[/img]


If you don\'t like the animated versions and wish to return to the boring default ones, simply delete those two files listed above and the original, unaltered Dwemer lift meshes which are safely contained in the Skyrim - Meshes.bsa will reappear in game.[/center]




[center][size=5][color=#FF0000][u]Optional file for Dragonborn DLC now available[/u][/color][/size][/center]

[center](Dragonborn DLC is required)[/center]




[center][Size=5][color=#FF0000][u]Tools used[/u][/color][/size][/center]

[center][Size=4][color=#FFA500]Blender[/color][/size]: To separate the gears from the brackets.[/center]

[center][Size=4][color=#00FFFF]Nifskope[/color][/size]: Animation.[/center]




[center][size=5][color=#00ff00][u]Thanks to:[/u][/color][/size]

[Size=4][color=#FFA500]Bethesda[/color][/size] for the Elder Scrolls games,

The creators of the fine programs [Size=4][color=#FFA500]Blender[/color][/size] and [Size=4][color=#00FFFF]Nifskope[/color][/size], 

[Size=4][color=#00ff00]Puresen[/color][/size] for Beta Testing,

[Size=4][color=#FFA500]Brumbek[/color][/size] for fixing something I didn\'t even know was broken,

and [Size=4][color=#FF0000]KillerHell[/color][/size] for the Animated Gifs.[/center]
author: DoubleBrewski

files.name: Animated Dwemer Lift Load Doors for Dragonborn DLC
